Smart Toothbrush: Develop an electric toothbrush with a built-in Bluetooth module that connects to a user's smartphone. The app can track brushing time, technique, and even detect when the user has brushed all surfaces of their teeth. The app can also provide personalized feedback and recommendations for improvement.

SonicToothbrush: Create an electric toothbrush that utilizes sonic technology, providing a more gentle and efficient cleaning experience. The toothbrush would have multiple speed settings and a rechargeable battery, ensuring a convenient and cost-effective alternative to traditional electric toothbrushes.

Toothbrush for Kids: Design an electric toothbrush specifically for children, with a colorful and fun design that appeals to their imagination. The toothbrush would have a detachable head for easy cleaning and a rechargeable battery that lasts for several days on a single charge.

Travel Toothbrush: Create an electric toothbrush that is compact and lightweight, perfect for travel. The toothbrush would have a built-in USB charging port, allowing users to charge it on the go. Additionally, the toothbrush would have a built-in timer that helps users brush for the recommended 2 minutes.

Personalized Toothbrush: Develop an electric toothbrush that utilizes 3D printing technology to create customized toothbrush heads tailored to each user's unique teeth. The toothbrush would use a mobile app to take a scan of the user's teeth, and then create a customized toothbrush head that fits their teeth perfectly. This would provide a more comfortable and effective cleaning experience for each user.
